extendedInfo.description: Choose the right hairstyle for you and learn to create it yourself! Find the right haircut and hair color for you, and learn how to take proper care of your hair!-More than 300 videos with tips on hair care and hairstyle!-Receive new hairstyle videos every day!-Advice on hair care, hair styling and hair coloring!-Tips and tricks for healthy and shiny hair!-Techniques for creating the latest hairstyles!-Make your hair look fabulous by following instructions from these videos!This app gives you advice on hair care, hair styling and coloring, and teaches you how to choose and achieve the perfect hairstyle and haircut for your face shape. Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you girls. This option bundles a few search points (icon, bookmark and homepage) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage). Thanks. This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray. Here are some stylish easy to do hairdos appropriate for school so you can look fabulous every day. Looking gorgeous doesn't keep count of age and easy to do styles for long hair are meant to make girls all over the world look beautiful.Style has nothing to do with age, so make sure you define your style and learn how to look pretty for school. Get some serious style credentials by learning how to look pretty for school! Paying attention to the details that make a difference as far as beauty and style go can have a serious impact over the way you're perceived and over the way you feel. If you feel the need for a change, you have to push yourself to find and develop your style.Healthy hair depends on your changing hormones, the pills you pop, and the foods you eat (or don't). It is a barometer of your overall health. Curly, straight, short or long â doesn't matter, the only thing that matters is that you should always pay attention to appropriate care. With 'Guide to Fabulous Hairstyles' you'll be able to learn how to make stylish hairdos any time you want. Just follow the instructions from the videos and find out different ways for stylish updos, curls, perms and much more!With this app women and girls will learn to choose the hair color that suits them best, to achieve it and make their hair look fabulous, and much more.
